txt.en: Smugglers have holed up in Esgaroth-of-old, using it as a base for mixing their prohibited goods into legitimate shipments. The Long Lake won't be safe again until they are removed.
Esgaroth smugglers can be found in Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should defeat Esgaroth smugglers.
Mervárth can be found outside Esgaroth-of-old.\n\nYou should talk to Mervárth.

'You look like you can handle yourself in combat, [placeholder]. While you're looking for that Elf, you should clear out as many of these smugglers as you can. If the Long Lake is ever going to be safe for traders again, they need to be removed!'
'Well, now I know for sure I can count on you in a fight! Good work! There's a few more smugglers in Lake-town that I'd love for you to meet....'
